what:
High Resolution World Vector Map Data from Natural Earth used in
    rnaturalearth
title:
High Resolution World Vector Map Data from Natural Earth used in
    rnaturalearth
text: R package store high resolution data rnaturalearth package. Data rnaturalearth packages : rnaturalearth : one low resolution example file & data can downloaded NaturalEarth using ne_download() rnaturalearthdata : low (scale 110) medium resolution (scale 50) files rnaturalearthhires : high resolution (scale 10) files

title:
High Resolution World Vector Map Data from Natural Earth used in
    rnaturalearth
text: Note rnaturalearthhires unlikely submitted CRAN size exceeds CRAN recommendations.

title: rnaturalearthhires 1.0.0
text: breaking changes release ends support sp object favour modern interfaces (sf terra). Although sp still available CRAN, longer actively developed (https://geocompx.org/post/2023/rgdal-retirement/). main reason motivated choice transition toward sf (default) terra. Users can choose either get sf SpatVector using returnclass argument: spatial objects package (countries10, map_units10, sovereignty10, states10, coastline10) now objects class sf. changing return type sf creates many problems existing code, can still convert back sp : information retirement rgdal, rgeos maptools: https://r-spatial.org/r/2022/04/12/evolution.html
code: ne_countries(returnclass = "sf") ne_countries(returnclass = "sv") # option 1 sf::as_Spatial(ojbcountries)   # option 2 as(countries, "Spatial")

title: rnaturalearthhires 0.2.1 2023-03-06
text: update data Natural Earth v5.1.2. add github action automate data updates
